comment.shortText: The name of the new layer. Omit to copy the name of the layer being duplicated

The position index of the layer. The lower the index, the lower the layer is in the stack.
Omit to add the layer above the layer being duplicated.
Pass a negative number to position starting from the top of the stack, ie. `-2` would be make it the 3rd layer from the top
Set to `true` to log debug info to the console
